content:
No worries about not getting Rachel's ID, but it's great that you'll keep it in mind for future flights. Recognizing exceptional service can really make a difference for the crew members and the airline as a whole.

Awesome that you're considering joining MileagePlus! It's definitely worth exploring, especially if you plan to fly with United Airlines more frequently. You can earn miles, redeem them for rewards, and enjoy perks like priority boarding and extra baggage allowance.

Don't forget to also explore the credit card options that United Airlines offers, like the United℠ Explorer Card or the United℠ Quest℠ Card. These cards can help you earn more miles, enjoy additional benefits, and even get a free first checked bag.

If you have any questions about MileagePlus or the credit cards, feel free to ask. I'm here to help!

Safe travels, and I hope you have a great experience on your upcoming flight with United Airlines!
